posts.post_content:
hey guys - I will be posting the last of my T206 dupes that I have owned for about 35 years.   If you need better scans just ask.   Prices include postage.   PM's please.

thanks.   -peter


McIntyre - printer's cut mark on the right border, chipping upper left, light paper loss on back  $40
Lake - nice gloss, faint crease upper left corner.  Nice card. $25
Rhodes - very, faint scuff on lower left, nice gloss, no creases $25
Tannehill - fat upper border, crease from below elbow to top of card.  $20



thanks for looking

I've owned all of these (except for Chance batting) since I was a kid.    As above, I try to describe any issues with the card that may not be seen on the scan.   Please PM to reserve.   Postage $2.   thanks again.   -peter

McGraw - creasing above Mugsy's head.  tiny black mark on lower front  $40
Chance - light crease through his ol' face.  stamp on back  $55
Willis - Polar Bear - no creases.  Nice stiff card.  Tobacco remnants stuck on back and a tiny nit on the S in 'Louis'   $35
Marquard - nice gloss and color, faint crease across NY, RG STAMP and period writing on back.   SC Fact 649 overprint  $50
I'll let you know when I get them.
Bump for price reduction.   thanks  peter
